eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: Zuo Le is attacked in the market, escaping only with Qiubai's help. Lee stumbles across Huai Tianpei's tracks. Lin Yühsia gets intel from the smugglers that convinces her there is more to the Catastrophe Messenger's death than meets the eye.

attributes.content: Ma, look, a fight!
attributes.name: Mischievous Kid

attributes.content: Happens all the time, haggling turning into a fight. Nothing to see.
attributes.name: Busy Woman

attributes.content: Stay close, I don't know how I'd find you if you got lost here.
attributes.name: Busy Woman

attributes.content: They won't give up so easily. Protecting ourselves is one thing, but it'll be hard to avoid harming civilians.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Do you have an idea?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: There's a way out, but you'll have a mess on your hands...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Wait––
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: (Damn, too late—)
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.text: The Shanhaizhong dart through the crowds like fins through water.
\nThe fins leap from the water en masse. Zuo Le and Lee cannot hope to fend off their attacks without harming the surrounding civilians.
Not scattered flakes of snow, but a steady stream of white.
The blizzard cuts off the rapid flow, stopping the Shanhaizhong in their tracks.

attributes.content: (Groans)
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Such a response is more than just talent and training; it is the result of experience accumulated from countless deadly battles.
Leave.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Don't chase.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: There are too many people here. These villains have no qualms about harming innocents.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: (Heavy panting)
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Q-Qiubai... it's been a while...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It's been a while, but you don't seem to have gotten any better.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Why have you come?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Grandmaster instructed me to help you.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: And who is this gentleman?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: A friend I met on a previous mission... and an old acquaintance of Liang's.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Someone without an official position shouldn't involve himself in this—even a friend of Liang's.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Ah, well, I just happened to pass by.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Anyway, someone always tells me not to meddle whenever I'm hired to do something. Guess it's a private eye trope.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: My life would have been in danger if not for your help. But are you really here by chance?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Would the Sui Regulator believe me if I said yes?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No jokes, please. This is important.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I never look for trouble; trouble just has a tendency to find me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'll leave it that my client is an acquaintance of Chief Wei of Lungmen. You may have already met him at the barracks last night.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I guess the ones who attacked you just now were the people he hired me to find.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What else do you know about what happened in Yumen last night?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Not much. The ones who hire private eyes aren't exactly the talkative type. You get used to it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Maybe I could help, if you told me more.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I stabbed the assassin in the scuffle last night, so I started my search in the clinics.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I searched every single clinic in the city and didn't find anything unusual, until the last one. A man called himself a helper and would not let me in.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I forced my way in and found gauze and blood. The man ran off with an agitated look on his face.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Someone has the nerve to obstruct the Sui Regulator in Yumen?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I wasn't sure what to make of it. Obstruction of justice is a crime, but I couldn't make heads or tails of what the man was talking about. It didn't feel premeditated.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Could you describe the man in more detail?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Let me think...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Feline, male. Looks to be in his forties... exceptionally skilled in kung fu.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Could it really be him?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We should hurry. Yühsia wants us to visit the deceased bodyguard's family.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I'm coming, I'm coming. This is the last house anyway.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Say, I haven't had the chance to ask you... why did you come to Yumen?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I told you, I set up my own logistics company.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Mr. Zheng told me his daughter came to Yumen too, but I didn't expect to actually meet you.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: That's how fate works, I guess.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Say, since we've worked together on this case, wouldn't it be natural for you to join Xingyu Logistics afterwards?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: You're still talking about this?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Anyway, it seems like Yühsia dragged a lot of people she knows into this.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I didn't know she was the Rat King's daughter.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: You know Mr. Lin too?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Not really. Dad's heard of him on his travels.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I thought you would know each other well, being fellow Lungmenites.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Lungmen isn't exactly one of those small towns where everybody knows everybody...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I see Mr. Lin from time to time in the course of my work, but I've only heard rumors about Yühsia.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I'm curious... what do Lungmenites think of the Rat King?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: The word 'Lungmenite' is way too broad.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Some think of him as a benevolent protector. Some want as little to do with him as possible. Others just see him as a kindly old man.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Only one thing is certain—he's the key to Lungmen's peace and security.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Sounds like someone not to be trifled with... must be hard being Miss Lin.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Why do you say that?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Fathers always want their children to walk the path they paved for them.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Especially accomplished fathers.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Do you not get along with Mr. Zheng?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I wouldn't say that... it's more like I prefer some distance between us.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Some fathers out there don't care about their children at all.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: They do as they please, leaving their children for somebody else to care for. They disappear for a decade without a word.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Do you mean...?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Never mind, I don't want to bring him up now.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: If the old man went missing for a decade, I would take over the association and rebuild it in my own image.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I would show him that I can do better.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: But what if he never comes back to see how well you've done?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: This is the place.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Hello? Anybody home?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Excuse me. We're—
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Hey, the door's unlocked. And there's nobody in the clinic.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: This is the fourth place.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: The guard who died was the son of the doctor here. The doctor's a local who's been running the clinic for decades. No other members in the household.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: News of the Messenger's death reached the city yesterday afternoon. The doctor should already know.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: But the room is neat and tidy. Not a speck of dust on the furniture. The two bags in the corner look like items from today's market.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I don't know Yumen customs, but it's as though nothing happened whatsoever.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: How would a father react to the news that his child is dead?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Certainly wouldn't act like nothing happened, at least.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: But there's no one home. It's not right for us to barge in.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Let's rendezvous with Yühsia.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: The warehouse that the smuggler talked about is just ahead.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Strange...
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Do you know this place?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I checked out the various depots in the city when I visited last time. This warehouse was used by the South Side Sword Forge for storing metals and Originium fuel.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: The Sword Forge is a reputable business operation. It shouldn't have anything to do with this.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Yau mou gaau coh?! He played us for fools!
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Take it easy.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: We're in no rush.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: He doesn't have the nerve to lie in a situation like that. We're already here; all we need to do is take a look.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You keep watch. I'll check it out.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Be careful.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Lost your way, miss?
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard

attributes.content: Isn't this the stonemason's warehouse?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm here to buy stone.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Your boss couldn't sculpt his way out of a shoebox, but the stone's not half-bad, so I thought I would buy a bunch.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: He gave me permission to come to the warehouse. He says you'll show me around.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Zhong's Stonemason?
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard

attributes.content: Think so. The shop at the east end of the market.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Zhong's Stonemason's warehouse is on the west side. This is the south side.
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard

attributes.content: So you can stop right there.
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard

attributes.content: Look around you. Nothing but iron and scrap metal, not a rock to be found.
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard

attributes.content: I'm sure you're lost.
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard

attributes.content: Damn, I even paid a guide to take me here! That fraud...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Sorry for the intrusion.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: It's fine. Let me see you out.
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard

attributes.content: The clouds part to let the bright sun shine through, stinging Lin Yühsia's skin slightly. She subconsciously reaches behind her neck, then looks up at the man.
What kind of attire would leave a sunburn on the neck like that?
What are you looking at?
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard

attributes.content: Nothing. Goodbye.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: How did it go?
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Stay here and keep a close eye out for nearby movement.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Something didn't seem right?
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Don't ask questions. Just keep your eyes peeled, and report anything unusual.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent
